attributes.action: Charge all people who call out an ambulance needlessly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The amount of calls the Ambulance Service receives for non emergency and repeat callers who think they will be seen quicker at A&E if they arrive by ambulance puts a strain on the service and endangers real casualties.  All drink and drug related calls should be charged.  A nominal fee system operated in other coutries around the world significantly reduced time wasting calls, thus providing resources to real patient care.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
